content: same as for the hat stop after a round 3 or 7 reserving enough yarn for the top cuff chart top cuff start with a purl round then repeat rounds c2 and c3 to match the first cuff bind off knitwise after a purl round © ashcroft-hempsall 2016 - for personal non-commercial use only one-night hat 3 © ashcroft-hempsall 2016 - for personal non-commercial use only
